motd: This is an early [31mexperimental[0m version of WebTerminal v4, please, consider this when submitting !URL=https://github.com/intersystems-ru/webterminal/issues (bug reports). Check the development progress !URL=https://github.com/intersystems-ru/webterminal/issues/61 (here) or !URL=http://intersystems-ru.github.io/webterminal (read) more about WebTerminal.

changes: Extended API: onTerminalInit and onUserInput functions support
COS read command incorrect behavior fix
Terminal client's API onUserInput solid performance
Terminal client's API extended with the print function
Terminal API extend with the "execute" function
Security update, now updating over https
